txt.en: Mounted Orcs have been threatening the people of the Norcrofts for some time. Thinning their number would provide a great benefit for those who have remained in Elthengels, as well as bring vengeance for those who have already fallen.
The people of Elthengels will greatly benefit from having fewer Orc-riders attacking those beyond the walls of the town.

Mounted Orcs have been threatening the people of the Norcrofts for some time. Thinning their number would provide a great benefit for those who have remained in Elthengels, as well as bring vengeance for those who have already fallen.
Orc-riders can be found in the fields north and west of Elthengels in the Norcrofts.\n\nThe mounted Orcs around Elthengels have been responsible for many casualties and much suffering.
The people of Elthengels will greatly benefit from having fewer Orc-riders to harass them.
